about_the_game:
Build Animated Fun Arcade games for your customers  Crane Games, Coin Pushers, Bowling, Air Hockey, Dance Games, Hit Target Throwing Games, Pinball, Motorcycle Racing Game, Unlock the lock game, Lightgun game, Arcade Cabinet, Japanese styled arcade cabinet, Ball Drop Arcade Game, Coin Pusher, Ring Toss, Pong Game, Vortex Game, Bowling Game, Big Wheel Spin, Ticket Checker, Lots of furniture object...and more on release!


Manage and modify games
Increase profits and keep customers happy by modifying jackpots, how often jackpots happen, the quality of prizes, credit cost and more!Goal Rewards Progress through new goals every run to unlock machines, money and talents.

ReplayabilityUnlock legend mods, that change the rules of the game completely. Offering new ways to win and new strategies. 

Create advertisements 
Drive in more customers with randomly generate advertisement campaigns, use your smarts to determine which ones will bring in the most profit.


EventsCreate events in your arcade light high score challenges, speed running, dance tournaments and more!

Economy / Management Manage your finances in Arcade Manager by adjusting the costs per credits when guests enter the arcade. Set different credit costs per machine, adjust jackpot settings like the odds

Arcade Manager Build and manage the arcade of your dreams in Arcade Manager! Start with a few machines, funky carpet, and sticky floors, then grow your business into a bustling entertainment hub, become a tycoon. of hitting a jackpot and the payout of the jackpot. Hire Staff each with different stats, like how fast they will repair/clean and how expensive they are. Events cost money and can be adjusted how big the event prize is.

short_description: Build and manage the Arcade of your dreams. Unlock lots of fully animated games, set their jackpots and build prize zones. Start with a humble local arcade and expand into an major arcade entertainment center! Unlock Legend mods to change the rules and strategies of the game.
